opticomlib.utils.Q

opticomlib.utils.Q(x)[source]

Q-function.

\[Q(x) = \frac{1}{2}\text{erfc}\left( \frac{x}{\sqrt{2}} \right)\]
Parameters:

x (float | list | tuple | ndarray) -- input value.

Returns:

Q(x) value.

Return type:

float

Example

>>> Q(0)
0.5
>>> Q([0,1,2,3])
array([0.5       , 0.15865525, 0.02275013, 0.0013499 ])
